|David                                 |2023-01-01|true|$DavidId=  |>2                        |
|prev ids: $BobId, $CharlieId, $DavidId|2025-05-01|true|$LastId=   |>0                        |

|$LastId   |prev ids: $BobId, $CharlieId, $DavidId|

|$DavidId  |David                                 |
